import { useState } from "react"; export default function Form() { const [firstName, setName] = useState(""); const [listName, setlistName] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [date, setDate] = useState(); function handelrSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log(firstName); console.log(listName ); console.log(password); console.log(date); setName(" ") setlistName(" ") setPassword("") setDate("0-0-dd") } return ( <>
handelrSubmit(e)} >
setName(e.target.value)} />
setlistName(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} required value={password} />
setDate(e.target.value)} />
); }
